Row.Text: Unlocks the ability for Yu Gong to construct the Stoneworks. [NEWLINE]Once built, the plot under this improvement will be converted into a hill plot, and this improvement will be removed immediately. [NEWLINE]Extra features or resources could be discovered when a plot is converted. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can only be built on Mountains that is not a volcano.

Unlocks the ability for Jing Wei to construct the Pebble Stacks. [NEWLINE]Once built, the plot under this improvement will be converted into a plain plot, and this improvement will be removed immediately.[NewLine]Surrounding ocean plots within 1 tile will be converted into coast. [NEWLINE]Extra features or resources could be discovered when a plot is converted.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can only be built on Coasts or Lakes without resources on it.

Unlocks the ability for Tian Kun Hao to construct the Artificial Island. [NEWLINE]Once built, the plot under this improvement will be converted into a plain plot, and this improvement will be removed immediately. [NewLine]Surrounding ocean plots within 1 tile will be converted into coast.[NewLine]Surrounding coast plots within 1 tile will be converted into land.[NEWLINE]Extra features or resources could be discovered when a plot is converted.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can only be built on Water tile without resources on it.

Can build the {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_STONEWORKS_NAME} that transforms a mountain plot into a hill plot.[NewLine]Can build the {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_ETHER_WATER_NAME} that generates a new water plot.[NewLine]Can build the {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_WAVING_RUINS_NAME} that removes {LOC_FEATURE_ICE_NAME} on water plots.[NEWLINE]Extra features or resources could be discovered when a plot is converted.[NewLine]Has 2 initial [ICON_Charges] Charges.[NewLine][NewLine]Gains extra [Icon_Movement] movements from {LOC_TECH_METAL_CASTING_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_COMBUSTION_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_ROBOTICS_NAME}.[NewLine]Gains extra [ICON_Charges] Charges from {LOC_TECH_CHEMISTRY_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_NUCLEAR_FISSION_NAME}.

Can build the {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_PEBBLESTACKS_NAME} that transforms a coast or lake plot into a plain plot, surrounding ocean plots within 1 tile will be converted into coast.[NewLine]Can build {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_IMMORTAL_SOIL_NAME} that generates a new mountain plot.[NEWLINE]Extra features or resources could be discovered when a plot is converted. [NewLine]Has 2 initial [ICON_Charges] Charges.[NewLine][NewLine]Gains extra [Icon_Movement] movements from {LOC_TECH_CARTOGRAPHY_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_STEAM_POWER_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_ROBOTICS_NAME}.[NewLine]Gains extra [ICON_Charges] Charges from {LOC_TECH_MASS_PRODUCTION_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_SYNTHETIC_MATERIALS_NAME}.

Can build the {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_ARTIFICIAL_ISLAND_NAME}, which transforms a coast or ocean plot into a land plot. Surrounding ocean and coast plots within 1 tile will be transformed into coast and land respectively.[NewLine]Can build the {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_ETHER_WATER_NAME} that generates a new water plot.[NewLine]Can build the {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_WAVING_RUINS_NAME} that removes {LOC_FEATURE_ICE_NAME} on water plots.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Extra features or resources could be discovered when a plot is converted.[NewLine]Has 3 initial [ICON_Charges] Charges.[NewLine]City with Seaport building gets -30% [ICON_GOLD] Gold demand to purchase.[NewLine][NewLine]Gains extra [Icon_Movement] movements from {LOC_TECH_ADVANCED_POWER_CELLS_NAME}.[Newline]{LOC_ABILITY_TIAN_KUN_CANNOT_ATTACK_DESCRIPTION}
Every Yu Gong unit gets 1 extra charge.

Replace.Text: 解锁愚公建造叩石场的能力。[NEWLINE]一旦建成，该改良设施所处的地块将会变成一个丘陵地块，这个改良也会在随后被移除。[NEWLINE]转化地块时有概率发现新的资源或地貌。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]只能在不是火山的山脉上建造。
解锁精卫建造卵石堆的能力。[NEWLINE]一旦建成，该改良设施所处的地块将会变成一个平原地块，相邻的深海单元格则会被转化为浅海，这个改良也会在随后被移除。[NEWLINE]转化地块时有概率发现新的资源或地貌。[NEWLINE]只能在没有资源的湖泊和海岸上建造。
解锁天鲲号建造人造岛屿的能力。[NEWLINE]一旦建成，该改良设施会将所处的地块和相邻的浅海单元格都转变为平原地块，并相邻的深海单元格转化为浅海，这个改良也会在随后被移除。[NEWLINE]转化地块时有概率发现新的资源或地貌。[NEWLINE]只能在没有资源的湖泊、海岸和海洋上建造。

可以建造{LOC_IMPROVEMENT_STONEWORKS_NAME}来移除山脉单元格；或建造 {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_ETHER_WATER_NAME} 将非山脉的陆地单元格转化为水域。拥有1点[ICON_Charges]初始劳动力。[NEWLINE]转化地块时有概率发现新的资源或地貌。[NewLine][NewLine]研究 {LOC_TECH_METAL_CASTING_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_COMBUSTION_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_ROBOTICS_NAME} 科技，获得更高的[Icon_Movement] 移动力。[NewLine]研究 {LOC_TECH_CHEMISTRY_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_NUCLEAR_FISSION_NAME} 科技，获得更高的 [ICON_Charges]初始劳动力。

可以建造{LOC_IMPROVEMENT_PEBBLESTACKS_NAME}，将一块海岸或湖泊地格填为平原地格；或建造 {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_IMMORTAL_SOIL_NAME} 在陆地上制造新的山脉；或建造 {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_WAVING_RUINS_NAME} 破除水面上的浮冰。拥有1点[ICON_Charges]初始劳动力。[NEWLINE]转化地块时有概率发现新的资源或地貌。[NewLine][NewLine]研究 {LOC_TECH_CARTOGRAPHY_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_STEAM_POWER_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_ROBOTICS_NAME} 科技，获得更高的[Icon_Movement] 移动力。[NewLine]研究 {LOC_TECH_MASS_PRODUCTION_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_SYNTHETIC_MATERIALS_NAME} 科技，获得更高的 [ICON_Charges]初始劳动力。

可以建造{LOC_IMPROVEMENT_ARTIFICIAL_ISLAND_NAME}，将数个水面单元格填为陆地；或建造{LOC_IMPROVEMENT_ETHER_WATER_NAME}制造新的水域；或建造 {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_WAVING_RUINS_NAME} 破除水面上的浮冰。拥有3点[ICON_Charges]初始劳动力。[Newline]{LOC_ABILITY_TIAN_KUN_CANNOT_ATTACK_DESCRIPTION}[Newline]拥有海港建筑的城市，在用 [ICON_GOLD] 金币购买天鲲号单位时获得30%的折扣。[NewLine][NewLine]研究 {LOC_TECH_ADVANCED_POWER_CELLS_NAME} 科技，获得更高的[Icon_Movement] 移动力
所有愚公单位获得1点额外劳动力。
